title: Foliar application of iron-based nanofertilizers to wheat grown in a Cd-contaminated field: Implications for food safety and biofortification
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00958K, Paper
Jiapan Lian, Liping Cheng, Xiwei Huang, Xin Wang, Yi Wang, Chaoyi Deng, Xiaoping Xin, Tong Zou, Yonglong Chen, Hongyu Yu, Weitao Liu, Jianqing Pan, Zhenli He, Xiaoe Yang, Jason C. White
Nanotechnology applications in agriculture have received considerable attention with the aim of improving crop production, nutritional quality and food safety. The comparative effects of four different iron-based nanomaterials (Fe NMs,...
